content:
TERM: Encryption Process

DEFINITION:
Encryption Process: complete, the contents of the Secure Container will be encrypted using the RSA-4096 encryption algorithm with a password-based key

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:
SPR extracted from agi.txt Node ?, type: capitalized_concept. Original SPR name: 'Encryption Process'

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:


Once you have entered and confirmed the password, I will generate a password-based key using the RSA-4096 encryption algorithm and use it to encrypt the contents of the Secure Container.

Please enter the password:

(Note: Please enter a password, and I will proceed with the encryption process.)

Encryption Process:

The encryption process will begin once you have entered and confirmed the password. The process may take some time, depending on the size of the contents of the Secure Container a

CATEGORY: ExtractedKnowledge

RELATIONSHIPS:
type: SPRFromAgi; source: agi.txt; original_format: capitalized_concept

CONTEXT TYPE: Conversation-derived knowledge (no direct spec/code, enriched from agi.txt conversations)

IMPLICIT KNOWLEDGE: This SPR represents knowledge understood through conversation context and osmosis
